mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.subject AS "subject", a.target_name AS "targetName", a.target_id AS "targetId", a.content AS "content", a.url AS "url", a.send_id AS "sendId", a.send_name AS "sendName", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO message( id, subject, target_name, target_id, content, url, send_id, send_name, create_date, del_flag, create_by, update_by, update_date ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{subject}, #{targetName}, #{targetId}, #{content}, #{url}, #{sendId}, #{sendName}, #{createDate}, #{delFlag}, #{createBy.id}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE message SET subject = #{subject}, target_name = #{targetName}, target_id = #{targetId}, content = #{content}, url = #{url}, send_id = #{sendId}, send_name = #{sendName}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT a.id AS "id", a.subject AS "subject", a.content AS "content", date_format(a.create_date,'%Y-%m-%d %T') AS "createDate", a.send_id AS "sendId", a.send_name AS "sendName" FROM message a WHERE a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
AND (a.target_id = '' OR a.target_id IS NULL OR a.target_id = #{targetId})
AND (a.target_id = '' OR a.target_id IS NULL)
ORDER BY a.create_date DESC
